citadels

Class PlayerScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • citadels.model.PlayerScore

  • public class PlayerScore
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds final score details for a player at the end of the game. Tracks base district score, bonuses for city diversity and completion, as well as any other bonus points (e.g. from purple districts).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerScore(int baseScore, int bonusDiverseCity, int bonusCompleteCity, int extraPoints)
      Creates a score object with all breakdown values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Calculates all score components for a player at end of game.

      int getBonusCompleteCity()

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerScore

        public PlayerScore(int baseScore,
                   int bonusDiverseCity,
                   int bonusCompleteCity,
                   int extraPoints)
        Creates a score object with all breakdown values.
        Parameters:
        baseScore - total district cost score
        bonusDiverseCity - 3 points if player has at least one of each district color
        bonusCompleteCity - 4 if first to finish, 2 if completed after someone else, 0 if not complete
        extraPoints - bonus points from purple district effects

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseScore

        public int getBaseScore()
        Returns:
        Total cost of all districts built (base score).

      • getBonusDiverseCity

        public int getBonusDiverseCity()
        Returns:
        +3 bonus if player has all 5 district colors (with Haunted City rules).

      • getBonusCompleteCity

        public int getBonusCompleteCity()
        Returns:
        +4 if player finished first, +2 otherwise if they reached 8 districts.

      • getExtraPoints

        public int getExtraPoints()
        Returns:
        Bonus from special purple card effects like Wishing Well, Museum, etc.

      • getTotalScore

        public int getTotalScore()
        Returns:
        Sum of base score, diversity bonus, completion bonus, and extra points.

      • calculateFor

        public static PlayerScore calculateFor(Player player,
                                       java.util.List<DistrictCard> cityDistricts,
                                       boolean isFirstToFinish,
                                       int finalRoundNumber)
        Calculates all score components for a player at end of game.
        Parameters:
        player - The player whose score is being calculated.
        cityDistricts - The list of districts the player has built.
        isFirstToFinish - Whether the player was the first to complete their city.
        finalRoundNumber - Final round of the game (used for Haunted City).
        Returns:
        PlayerScore object representing total points and breakdown.
